message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I think you'd really love. I'm asking for $120 for it, but I'm open to negotiation.
Hi Alice, thank you for offering the product. I believe I can offer $105 for it, reflecting its true value to me.

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer.  While I appreciate your interest, I'm still hoping for a little closer to my asking price.  How about $115?  I'm confident you'll find this product a great value at that price.
Alice, I appreciate your persistence. I am willing to go up to $110 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
